about_the_game: Lift: The Last Days of the Westwind is an interactive VR narrative adventure, in which you take on the role of the Westwind Hotel’s final elevator operator, guiding the lives of its patrons through action and gesture as the historic hotel nears the end of its life. Operate a fully interactive elevator, meet fascinating characters, and make decisions that change their lives, and the fate of the hotel forever. Play through a day and a half of the life of an elevator operator at the Westwind!
